item.title: Documents & Requirements
item.description:
Documents & Requirements

  • Passport/ID
  • Medical certificate (country-specific)
  • Proof of residency
  • Passport photo
  • Other local requirements

item.description:
How We Work

We handle every step for you:

  1. Initial contact & document check
  2. Registration with approved school
  3. Document management
  4. Exam preparation
  5. Exam booking & support

Legal, transparent, and easy.

item.title: Pricing & Packages
item.description:
Pricing & Packages

We offer clear, upfront pricing. Contact us for a custom quote based on your country and needs.

item.title: We Register For You
item.description:
We Register For You

We select the best school for your needs, handle all paperwork, and ensure your registration is complete and legal.
